attributes.action: prevent touts from selling entertainment tickets for a profit and to establish a system of fair exhcange
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Touts are in a very commanding position at present, people based in London were the first to suffer from something that is now country wide and getting to epidemic proportions. 

One of the reasons we started this petition is a belief that if all the music and sports fans listed there spare tickets on properly regulated sites and at the same time if everyone went to the sites first before going to eBay, there would be less people bidding on ebay and the prices would begin to fall.

Touts are ruining all facets of the entertainment industry for people who save up for weeks, months and even years to go to an event they cherish in their hearts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
